attributes.review: (please read this all for your safety🙀🙀) I am SERIOUSLY not part of this gen z thing, i dont even have tik tok🚫 but i decided to get this app for more info on my bae trumpy🥰 right when i downloaded the app it said it needed 40GB of data which is more than tje space i even have on my phone!! you might be thinking oh thats normal just get a new phone📱✨ so i did i got the iphone11 pro, but this time it took 3 weeks to download and when it was finally installed i heard loud screaming and crashes coming from my kitchen so i went downstairs and discovered both of my pet cats going down the drain in the sink that was overflowing everywhere💦‼️ this is ironic because on the otherside of the room there were flames on the wall and they seemed to form the word “trump2020” and thats when i realized....i had been tricked😔 i decided i needed to take immediate action so i went to call the police but my phone WOULD NOT WORK it was filled with viruses and was crashing and making very high pitched noises so bad i bet if i were just a few years older i would have DIED💀 then my phone started morphing into an oompa loompa‼️ though, this was expected since it was a trump app. this creature was chasing me and trying to stab me with Trump 2020 pins and i realized that my entire house had caught on fire and the rest of my family were struggling to survive‼️ i tried to go in help them but the oompa loompa held me back and they died before i got to them💔 i still didnt give up so i ran outside and tried to trick the oompa loompa into falling in love with me😻 i used my old burner phone that i originally used to look at all the allegations against trump on😻✨ and then is streamed SHAWTY LIKE A MELODY IN MY HEAD and the oompa loompa fell head over heels for me right then and there👠 OR SO I THOUGHT‼️ i remembered i still had my phone so i tried to uninstall the app and it was taken away from me‼️ then a large swarm of chupacabras (yes, they are real‼️) started swarming around me and i was trapped🙀 then they all started laughing at me and pointing upwards so i looked towards the sky and you wouldnt believe who it was.... “BERTRAM😻” i yelled as he came falling down but then he came down at 6000mph CRUSHING ME. i finally was able to get up and remembered our long years of love we had🥺 he didnt even look like himself💔 i was heartbroken💔 slowly and painfully i died right in front him the oompa loompa the chupacabras and my burning house. as of now my mom and dad and brother are dead and so are my pet cats and i am dead. do not download or this will happen to you.
attributes.title: i am broken💔
